verify_email_to_complete_signup: A verification e-mail has been sent to you. Please, confirm it to complete your registration
verify_mail_text: NIC-PAD's App needs to confirm your e-mail address is valid. Please, click the link to proceed:
verify_email_send_failed: Verification e-mail could not be sent. Please, try to register later
password_reset_sent: Case informed e-mail is associated to a valid account you will receive a link to password reset
reset_pass_email_send_failed: Reset password e-mail could not be sent. Please, try it later
reset_pass_mail_text: Someone (hopefully you) has requested a password reset for your NIC-PAD's App account. Click the link to set a new password:
reset_password_token_invalid: Reset password link is not valid
